ul:
Microsoft® Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 3.5 
Microsoft Visual Studio® 2008
p: Consider using Transport Security as your peferred security mode.
Transport Security provides confidentiality, integrity, and authenticity and it may result in better performance.

Consider transport security as your preferred security mode, as it provides with confidentiality, integrity, and authenticity and it may result in better performance. If you use message security or mixed mode security, consider profiling and testing your application to assess its performance and scalability characteristics, to confirm it meets your business requirements.
Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.

html:
Applies to

  • Microsoft® Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 3.5
  • Microsoft Visual Studio® 2008

What to Do

Consider using Transport Security as your peferred security mode.

Why

Transport Security provides confidentiality, integrity, and authenticity and it may result in better performance.

How

Consider transport security as your preferred security mode, as it provides with confidentiality, integrity, and authenticity and it may result in better performance. If you use message security or mixed mode security, consider profiling and testing your application to assess its performance and scalability characteristics, to confirm it meets your business requirements.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
